name: David Martin Drew
description: I am a loving, kind, compassionate person that enjoys doing most things. I’m always up for a new adventure. I enjoy walks, going for drives, swimming, or just about anything outdoors if the weather is nice. I do consider myself a Christian, although I’m not perfect and I fail at times, I love and believe in God and try to live my life accordingly. I am a smiler and laugher, can never laugh too much and I like being around people that make me laugh. I’m not into drama or even coming close to being around it. I am looking for an old school woman that has manners and knows how to treat a man the right way. I am looking for a long term relationship. I don’t like liars, cheaters, or playing games so if you do please don’t bother contacting me.
